root.name: Blood Bowl II
root.description: The Image that was attached to the first Tweet "announcing" the games existence.As of this posting not much is know about the game other than that it exists and that it has been in development for about six months now according to a couple tweets from the official Focus Home Entertainment Twitter account and from a developer of the game. They are trying for an early 2014 release date, but nothing more has been announced as of this time.
